about_the_game:
GET THE FULL EXPERIENCE


Can't get enough of Kuroi Tsubasa?
How about this lil' bonus content?

This DLC contains three things:
  • A character model viewer in the game itself
  • Desktop Wallpapers in 4k resolution
  • An exclusive Orchestral Rendition of Kurehas theme, which you can use for Video and Stream production

The Character viewer will be available from the main menu.

To access the Song and the Wallpapers you need to navigate to the game's local files.
To do that, follow these easy steps:

HOW TO ACCES THE SONG AND THE WALLPAPERS

First, right click on the entry of the game in your Steam library. Next, choose "Properties".

After than, choose the tab "Local Files" and click "Browse" on the top right.

Last, doubleclick the "DLC" folder and enjoy your DLC goodies~

GET THE FULL EXPERIENCE


Can't get enough of Kuroi Tsubasa?
How about this lil' bonus content?

This DLC contains three things:
  • A character model viewer in the game itself
  • Desktop Wallpapers in 4k resolution
  • An exclusive Orchestral Rendition of Kurehas theme, which you can use for Video and Stream production

The Character viewer will be available from the main menu.

To access the Song and the Wallpapers you need to navigate to the game's local files.
To do that, follow these easy steps:

HOW TO ACCES THE SONG AND THE WALLPAPERS

First, right click on the entry of the game in your Steam library. Next, choose "Properties".

After than, choose the tab "Local Files" and click "Browse" on the top right.

Last, doubleclick the "DLC" folder and enjoy your DLC goodies~

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 370 MB available space

short_description: This DLC includes HIGH QUALITY WALLPAPERS in 4k resolution, a special character viewer mode in the game and a secret unreleased song!
